title: Devlog â€” Navigation & JSON Blog System
description: Added a JSON-driven blog system compatible with GitHub Pages.
content:
# Devlog

We added a blog system that loads posts from JSON files in /blogs.

## Notes
- Uses client-side fetch to read JSON.
- Supports categories and tags.
- Basic markdown support (headings, lists, bold, italics, links, code blocks).

**Enjoy!**
